name: UploadTransactionMemo
description:
Upload a new memo for a specific transaction.

Use this tool to upload a memo to a specified transaction. It is triggered when there is a need to add a note or explanation to a transaction.

parameters.name: transaction_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the transaction to which the memo will be uploaded. It should be a string representing the transaction's ID.

parameters.name: memo_text
parameters.description: Text content of the memo to create for a transaction.

value_schema.description: Text content of the memo to create.

parameters.name: apply_memo_to_future_transactions
parameters.description: Indicate if the memo should automatically apply to similar future transactions. Use true for recurring, false otherwise.

value_schema.description: Whether this memo should automatically apply to similar future transactions.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.

parameters.name: is_memo_recurring
parameters.description: Whether this memo should automatically apply to similar future transactions.

value_schema.description: Whether this memo should automatically apply to similar future transactions.

parameters.name: memo
parameters.description: Text content of the memo to create.

value_schema.description: Text content of the memo to create.
